# mojave
## Tooig Operating System

I deleted the previous documentation. I'll fix it. And then we'll go from there.

## How to build
### Requirements

- A Linux system
- A cross-compiler
- GNU Make

```
$ make
from flask import Flask

app = Flask(__name__)

@app.route('/')
def home():
    return 'Hello, World!'

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app.run()

```
